definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (si vera l.) Ez Eze 27:23, named after [[אַשּׁוּר]], LXX Xarman; = mod. Kalwâdha near Bagdad, acc. to G. Smith:TSBA i, 61 Dl:Pa 206, cf. Schr:COT; but txt. Dub. v. Co; Targum [[ומדי]], whence Mez:Stadt Ḥarran 34 [[כָּל־מָדַי]] all Media; JKi Hi Co [[כְּלִמּוּד]] ([[רְכֻלָּתֵח]]) Asshur was as thine apprentice (v. sub [[למד]]) in trading; but sense not very prob.
